item.title: 黄金连续第三天从纪录高位回落
item.description: 黄金连续第三天下跌，向每盎司 4,000 美元的方向回落，原因是人们担心长期的涨势已经过热。【原文：Gold declined for a third day, edging back in the direction of $4,000 an ounce on concerns a prolonged rally has become overheated.】

item.title: Polymarket 正在寻求估值高达 150 亿美元的融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，预测市场 Polymarket 正在与投资者进行早期对话，希望以 120 亿至 150 亿美元的估值进行融资，这是其四个月前估值的 10 倍多。【原文：The prediction market Polymarket is holding early conversations with investors and looking to raise money at a valuation between $12 billion and $15 billion, more than 10 times its value just four months ago, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新兴亚洲实际收益率飙升，与名义利率形成鲜明对比
item.description: 新兴亚洲债券扣除通胀因素后的收益率与名义收益率相比大幅飙升，提高了该地区债务的吸引力。【原文：Yields on emerging Asian bonds after adjusting for inflation have surged versus nominal yields, raising the appeal of the region’s debt.】

item.title: 必和必拓确认与中国就铁矿石进行商业谈判
item.description: 必和必拓集团主席罗斯-麦克尤恩（Ross McEwan）在周四于墨尔本举行的年会上证实，该矿业巨头正在与中国国有铁矿石买家进行商业谈判。【原文：BHP Group Chair Ross McEwan confirmed the mining giant was in commercial negotiations with China’s state-run iron ore buyer, during its annual meeting in Melbourne on Thursday.】

item.title: 卡尼设定十年内将加拿大对非美国出口翻一番的目标
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大的目标是到2035年将其对美国以外市场的出口翻一番，以获得3000亿加元（约合2140亿美元）的额外贸易额。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said Canada will aim to double its exports to markets outside the US by 2035 to net an extra C$300 billion ($214 billion) in trade.】

item.title: Amundi 认为财政风险将日本 30 年期收益率推向新高
item.description: Amundi 预测，由于担心日本新首相将增加借贷，日本长期国债收益率可能在未来几个月内创下新高。【原文：Amundi predicts yields on long-maturity Japanese government debt could hit fresh record highs in the coming months on concern the country’s new prime minister will boost borrowing.】

item.title: 特斯拉马斯克称三星在其芯片生产中扮演更重要角色
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，三星电子公司正在该汽车制造商的芯片制造中发挥更大的作用，这表明这家韩国公司正在台湾半导体制造公司（TSMC）主导的市场中取得进展。【原文：Tesla Inc. Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said that Samsung Electronics Co. is taking a bigger role in manufacturing the carmaker’s chips, signaling that the South Korean company is making inroads in a market dominated by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: 托尼-布莱尔研究所称英国应放弃 2030 年清洁能源目标
item.description: 托尼-布莱尔研究所（Tony Blair Institute）的一份报告指出，英国应放弃到 2030 年实现电力供应去碳化的旗舰目标，取而代之的是以降低成本为重点的渐进战略。【原文：The UK should row back on its flagship goal to decarbonize its electricity supply by 2030 and replace it with more gradual strategy focused on keeping down costs, according to a report from the Tony Blair Institute.】

item.title: 中国限制保证金威胁股市宠儿反弹
item.description: 就在中美贸易紧张局势重燃，本月涨势骤然停滞之际，一项旨在抑制高估股票敞口的规定正给中国市场带来另一个挑战。【原文：A rule aimed at curbing exposure to overvalued stocks is posing another challenge to China’s market, just as renewed Sino-American trade tensions have abruptly stalled the rally this month.】

item.title: 伍德赛德向威廉姆斯出售路易斯安那液化天然气和管道股份
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）向美国能源基础设施公司威廉姆斯公司（Williams Cos.【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. sold stakes in its Louisiana liquefied natural gas export plant and a connected pipeline to American energy infrastructure company Williams Cos.】

item.title: 看好人民币前景，中国企业加速抛售美元
item.description: 随着对人民币进一步升值的乐观情绪升温，中国的银行上个月帮助客户以 2020 年以来最快的速度抛售海外货币。【原文：Chinese banks helped clients offload overseas currencies at the fastest pace since 2020 last month, as optimism toward further yuan appreciation grew.】

item.title: 前花旗和贝尔银行家在新加坡丑闻中认罪
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. 和瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd. ）的两名前银行家因涉嫌协助在新加坡最大洗钱案中被定罪的几人转移非法资金而将认罪。【原文：Two former bankers at Citigroup Inc. and Julius Baer Group Ltd. are set to plead guilty for their alleged roles in aiding the movement of illicit funds by several people convicted in Singapore’s biggest money laundering case.】

item.title: 网络犯罪率攀升，日本公司准备应对更多攻击
item.description: 最近针对日本企业的网络攻击浪潮暴露了该国企业数字防御的关键弱点，加剧了对销售和供应链进一步中断的担忧。【原文：The recent wave of cyberattacks against Japanese businesses has exposed critical weaknesses in the country’s corporate digital defenses, fueling fears of further disruption to sales and supply chains.】

item.title: 福特斯库第一季度铁矿石发货量增长 4
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 第一季度的铁矿石发货量增长了 4%，原因是尽管存在可能出现供应过剩的担忧，但中国对钢铁产品的需求显示出了韧性。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s shipments of iron ore increased 4% in its first quarter, as Chinese demand for the steel-making product shows resilience despite concerns of a possible supply glut.】

item.title: 华尔街盘后亚洲期货下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市和避险资产普遍下跌的动荡时段之后，亚洲股市准备低开。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to open lower after a volatile session on Wall Street that saw broad losses across equities and haven assets.】

item.title: 美国制裁俄罗斯石油公司和卢克石油公司后石油价格大涨
item.description: 美国宣布对俄罗斯最大的石油生产商实施制裁，这是特朗普政府向普京总统施压，要求其通过谈判结束乌克兰战争的最新举措。【原文：Oil jumped after the US announced sanctions on Russia’s biggest producers in the Trump administration’s latest bid to pressure President Vladimir Putin to negotiate an end to the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 尽管销售额骤降，茶叶连锁店 Chagee 仍坚持高价销售
item.description: 茶叶生产商 Chagee Holdings Inc. 尽管销售额和利润因消费者涌向价格只有其三分之一的其他饮料连锁店而大幅下滑，但该公司仍坚持高价提供优质产品的战略。【原文：Tea maker Chagee Holdings Inc. is holding firm to a strategy of premium products at high prices, despite a plunge in sales and profit from consumers flocking to other chains offering beverages for a third the price.】

item.title: 日本顶级地方银行准备在日本央行转向时加大购买日本国债的力度
item.description: 日本最大的地区性贷款机构横滨银行（Bank of Yokohama Ltd.）准备在中央银行的利率峰值即将到来之际，重新投入国内债务市场。【原文：Bank of Yokohama Ltd., Japan’s largest regional lender, is prepared to pile back into the domestic debt market when the central bank’s peak interest rate is in sight.】

item.title: 加密货币领导人前往国会山推动市场结构法案
item.description: 包括 Coinbase Global Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）和 Chainlink Labs 的谢尔盖-纳扎罗夫（Sergey Nazarov）周三与民主党和共和党领导人进行了近三个小时的会晤，讨论市场结构立法问题。【原文：About a dozen crypto industry leaders including Coinbase Global Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Armstrong and Chainlink Labs’ Sergey Nazarov met with Democratic and Republican leaders Wednesday for almost three hours to discuss market-structure legislation.】

item.title: Beyond Meat 股票狂飙引发做空狂潮
item.description: Beyond Meat Inc. 股价的快速反弹让一些卖空者争先恐后地退出头寸，以避免进一步的损失，而另一些卖空者则加倍押注该股。【原文：The rapid rally in shares of Beyond Meat Inc. has sent some short sellers scrambling to exit their positions to avoid further damage, while still others doubled down on their bets against the stock.】

item.title: 美国推出提高牛肉产量计划，增加阿根廷配额
item.description: 特朗普政府发布了一项鼓励放牧和提高国内牛肉产量的计划，同时还单独提高了阿根廷牛肉的进口配额。【原文：The Trump administration released a plan to encourage ranching and boost domestic beef production, as it separately raised a quota for Argentine beef imports.】

item.title: 中国为何在特朗普的贸易战中占上风？
item.description:
Gavekal Dragonomics' Arthur Kroeber加入特朗普经济学，讨论最新的针锋相对如何揭示出北京在与华盛顿的对峙中不断增长的影响力。【原文：

Gavekal Dragonomics’ Arthur Kroeber joins Trumponomics to discuss how the latest tit-for-tat reveals Beijing’s growing leverage in its standoff with Washington.

】

item.title: Waymo 将在纽瓦克机场测试配备人类驾驶员的车辆
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的 Waymo 将开始在纽瓦克机场与人类司机一起手动测试其自动驾驶汽车，为最终在该交通枢纽接送乘客奠定基础。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo will begin manually testing its autonomous vehicles with human drivers at Newark airport, laying the foundation to eventually ferry passengers to and from the transit hub.】

item.title: 罗伯特-哈弗展望不及预期反映劳动力市场疲软
item.description: 罗伯特-哈夫公司（Robert Half Inc.【原文：Robert Half Inc. issued profit guidance below analysts’ estimates, signaling that the global jobs market is continuing to soften.】

item.title: 铂金成为价格飙升和挤压担忧的最新贵金属
item.description: 最近白银市场的挤压还未尘埃落定，本周黄金又经历了剧烈的价格调整，贵金属交易商们又要面对另一出戏，这次是铂金市场。【原文：With the dust barely settled on the recent squeeze in the silver market, and with gold just this week experiencing a violent price correction, precious metals traders are contending with yet another drama, this time in the platinum market.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟开始与竞购者共享财务数据
item.description: 据一位熟悉华纳兄弟发现公司计划的人士透露，该公司预计最早将于本周开始要求有意竞购该影视巨头的竞购者签署保密协议。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. expects to begin asking would-be bidders for the film and TV giant to sign nondisclosure agreements as early this week, according to a person familiar with its plans.】

item.title: DeepSeek 在非洲的突飞猛进揭示了中国对人工智能权力的争夺
item.description:
通过降低人工智能的成本和功耗，DeepSeek 让数百万人可以接触到这项技术。【原文：

By making AI cheaper and less power-hungry, DeepSeek has put the technology within reach of millions of people.

】

item.title: 无人机 CEO 错过 Meme 股价暴涨 500% 的机会后毫不动摇
item.description: 当无人机盾牌有限公司（DroneShield Ltd.当首席执行官奥列格-沃尼克（Oleg Vornik）卖掉了他花了近十年时间创建的公司的全部股份时，他并不知道这家澳大利亚防务公司即将被卷入 "备忘录股票 "狂潮。【原文：When DroneShield Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Oleg Vornik sold his entire holding in the company he spent nearly a decade building, he had no idea that the Australian defense firm was about to be swept up in meme stock mania.】

item.title: 汽车供应商破产引发担忧，O'Reilly上调全年业绩展望
item.description: 欧莱利汽车公司（O'Reilly Automotive Inc.【原文：O’Reilly Automotive Inc. raised its full-year earnings outlook, easing concerns about potential fallout from the bankruptcy of an auto parts supplier.】

item.title: 美国铝业公司认为铝运输的关税成本将继续上升
item.description: 美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp.）称，美国第三季度对加拿大铝征收进口关税使其损失比前三个月多出6900万美元，显示出特朗普政府的贸易措施对该行业的持续影响。【原文：Alcoa Corp. said US import tariffs on Canadian aluminum in its third quarter cost it $69 million more than the previous three-month period, showing the continued impacts of the Trump administration’s trade measures on the industry.】
